teams.CLAIM_TEAM_INPUT_HELPER_TEXT: Any combination of 4 to 10 letters, digits or _

draft.DRAFT_NOT_STARTED_MESSAGE: DRAFT WILL START AFTER SEASON ENDS

teamManagement.TEAM_MGR_SEND_TEAM_INPUT_HELPER_TEXT: Any valid address that can hold ERC721 token
teamManagement.TEAM_MGR_SEND_TEAM_LABEL: TRANSFER THIS TEAM TO OTHER ONE

dialog.DIALOG_WAITING_CONFIRMATION_MESSAGE: Waiting confirmation from the chain, be patient...

errorDesc.ALREADY_CLAIMED_A_TEAM: Each address can claim one team only
errorDesc.DRAFT_INVALID_PICK_ORDER: It's not your turn to pick player
errorDesc.IN_DRAFT_ONLY: Can only act in a draft
errorDesc.LEAGUE_CONTRACT_ONLY: Only League Constract can call this
errorDesc.MATCH_CONTRACT_ONLY: Only Match Constract can call this
errorDesc.MATCH_PLAYED_BEFORE_SCHEDULED_DATE: Mactch should not be played before scheduled time
errorDesc.NO_MORE_TEAM_TO_CLAIM: No more team left to claim. Maximum 30
errorDesc.NO_TEAM_OWNED: You must own a team in the first place
errorDesc.PRESEASON_ONLY: Can only act on the preseason
errorDesc.PLAYER_ALREADY_ON_THIS_TEAM: This player is already on this team
errorDesc.PLAYER_EXCEED_SHOT_ALLOC: Shot allocation per player must be less than 25% of team total
errorDesc.PLAYER_EXCEED_TIME_ALLOC: Shot allocation per player must be less than 1/3 of their play time percentage. i.e if given 10% shot allocation, this player must play at least 30% game time(~15 min)
errorDesc.PLAYER_NAME_IMAGE_ALREADY_SET: Can only set the name and image of a player once
errorDesc.PLAYER_NOT_ABLE_TO_CLAIM: Cannot claim a player if it is not retired
errorDesc.PLAYER_NOT_ELIGIBLE_FOR_DRAFT: Player is not eligible for draft
errorDesc.PLAYER_NOT_ON_THIS_TEAM: This player does not belong to your team
errorDesc.TEAM_CONTRACT_ONLY: Only Team Constract can call this
errorDesc.TEAM_EXCEED_MAX_PLAYER_COUNT: Exceeded the maximum player limit of this team. Maximum 15.
errorDesc.TEAM_INSUFFICIENT_2P_SHOT_ALLOC: Total 2-pont shot allocations must sum up to 100%
errorDesc.TEAM_INSUFFICIENT_3P_SHOT_ALLOC: Total 3-pont shot allocations must sum up to 100%
errorDesc.TEAM_LESS_THAN_MIN_ROSTER: Number of players per team must be more than 8
errorDesc.TEAM_MORE_THAN_MAX_ROSTER: Number of players per team must be less than 12
errorDesc.TEAM_NOT_ENOUGH_STARTERS: Starter in each position must be playable
errorDesc.TEAM_POS_TIME_ALLOC_INVALID: Players of the same position must have play time add up to 48 minutes
errorDesc.TEAM_REDUNDANT_STARTERS: Each position can have only one starter
errorDesc.TEAM_TOO_MANY_ACTIVE_TRADE_TX: This team has too many active trade transactions. Maximum 10
errorDesc.TEAM_UNABLE_TO_ACQUIRE_UD_PLAYER: Can only acquire undrafted player when playable roster falls under 8
errorDesc.TRADE_ACTIVE_TX_ONLY: Can only act on active TradeTx
errorDesc.TRADE_INITIATED_BY_ME_ONLY: Can only act on transactions initiated by your own team
errorDesc.TRADE_PROPOSED_TO_ME_ONLY: Can only act on transactions proposed to your own team
errorDesc.SEASON_END_OF_MATCH_LIST: Match index reached the end of the match list
errorDesc.SEASON_CONTRACT_ONLY: Only Season Constract can call this
errorDesc.SEASON_MATCH_ROUND_OUT_OF_ORDER: Match round should be added monotonically into matchList
errorDesc.SEASON_NOT_ENOUGH_TEAMS: Must have at least 2 teams to schedule a season
errorDesc.SEASON_TEAM_COUNT_NOT_EVEN: Team count should be even to start a season
errorDesc.PLAYER_INVALID_MIN_NUMERIC_INPUT: Invalid numeric input for player minutes
errorDesc.PLAYER_INVALID_SHOT_NUMERIC_INPUT: Invalid numeric input for player 2-point shot percentage
errorDesc.PLAYER_INVALID_3P_SHOT_NUMERIC_INPUT: Invalid numeric input for player 3-point shot percentage
errorDesc.TEAM_INVALID_3P_NUMERIC_INPUT: Invalid numeric input for team 3-point shot percentage
